data.text:
apple.news/ARZVst_dDRKq0fK-F61lufw

I'm a bit unmotivated today, read this and thought it was quite interesting on a couple of levels.

Firstly, it could be argued that Bruce's wife has drawn the short straw stuck in LA with two young kids on her own whilst he gets to hang out with other adults! I'm sure many of us are in that situation! Thoughts?

Secondly...isolating with your ex. Yes they've been apart for years and he's been happily remarried for a long time but I wondered how the average person would feel in this circumstance? Would you be bothered or not? I'm not in a situation where this could happen so have no real world view!
